song.title: Beyond the Network
song.info:
Note from skaven's site: "The musical suite composed for Bejeweled 2, a sequel to the popular PopCap game. The music is also a sequel to the original Network (which you can find below). 31 minutes of 80's style synth-ambient music. Contains multiple parts."
Note from admin: (the uploader omitted this info on purpose): "Note: the track is long, so the MP3 / OGG downloads are huge. Copyright PopCap Games. Do not use in other productions."
[i]Note: Play time has been cut to 12 minutes.[/i]
